text: Uniharule bhane ki yadi usale cori garyo bhane (kunai ascaryako kura ho'ina) tyasabhanda agavai usako dajule pani cori garisakeko cha yusuphale yasa kurala'i aphno mutumai rakhili'e ra tyasa kurala'i unako agadi bilkulai prakata garenan, bhaneh ki timi kharaba thamuma chau, ra juna timi bayana gardachau usala'i allaha nai suksmarupale bes'sari jandacha
